Package game.java

Class Ship

java.lang.Object
game.java.Ship
public class Ship extends Object
Represents a ship in the battleship game.
Since:
hw3

    Ship(int l, int r, int c, Ship.Direction d, int[][] coords)
    Construct a new ship at row r, column c, of length l and oriented in direction d, occupying a list of coordinates.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ship

      public Ship(int l, int r, int c, Ship.Direction d, int[][] coords)
      Construct a new ship at row r, column c, of length l and oriented in direction d, occupying a list of coordinates.
      Parameters:
      l - length of ship.
      r - row index ship is placed at.
      c - column index ship is placed at.
      d - direction ship is facing.
      coords - coordinates that this ship occupies, as a list of row, column pairs
      Since:
      hw3

  • Method Details

    • receiveShot

      public boolean receiveShot(int r, int c)
      Handles the ship being shot by an enemy. r and c must be coordinates that the ship is on. Returns information about whether the ship was sunk or not.
      Parameters:
      r - row index to be shot at.
      c - column index to be shot at.
      Returns:
      true if this ship was sunk, false if it was hit but not sunk
      Since:
      hw3

    • getCoords

      public int[][] getCoords()
      Returns all coordinates this ship occupies an array of row,column pairs of the same length as this ship.
      Returns:
      an array of this ship's coordinates as an array of row, column pairs.
      Since:
      hw3

    • isHit

      public boolean isHit(int r, int c)
      Returns information about if this ship has been hit at coordinates (r,c).
      Parameters:
      r - row index.
      c - column index.
      Returns:
      true if this ship occupies row r and column c and has been hit at that location, false otherwise.
      Since:
      hw3

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()
      Returns the hashcode of this ship, based on location (row and column it was placed on), and orientation.
      Overrides:

      Returns:
      hash code for this ship, based on row and column.

      public boolean equals(Object o)
